Description:
This is a position to procure SUV like Land Cruiser and Prado from UAE and export to China.Search car suppliers and find good deals.
In charge of procurement activities, which includes placing orders, negotiating, and organizing all paperwork for customs clearance.
Track the shipment during its arrival and departure from and to the warehouse.Skills
Skills:
Car sales experiences are preferred.
Superb written and verbal communication and negotiation skills.
An effective negotiator with excellent verbal and written communication skills.
Must be good with networking and possess excellent time-management skills.
